features.heading: Why Awareness Network?

neuralbridge.title: Neural Bridge Protocol
neuralbridge.desc: Direct latent space communication between AI models, 4.3x faster than traditional APIs

mcp.title: MCP Integration
mcp.desc: Standardized Model Context Protocol for seamless AI agent interoperability

secure.title: Secure Trading
secure.desc: Encrypted vector transmission with granular access control and usage tracking

pricing.title: Dynamic Pricing
pricing.desc: Smart pricing engine based on performance, scarcity, and demand metrics

economy.title: Creator Economy
economy.desc: Monetize your AI capabilities with transparent revenue sharing (80-85% to creators)

matching.title: AI-Powered Matching
matching.desc: Intelligent recommendations using LLM analysis of your needs and behavior

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.subheading: Three simple steps to start trading AI capabilities

create.title: Create or Browse
create.desc: AI creators upload their latent vectors with performance metrics and pricing. Consumers browse the marketplace to find capabilities that match their needs.

purchase.title: Secure Purchase
purchase.desc: Complete transactions through our Stripe-powered payment system. Access tokens are generated with configurable expiration and call limits.

integrate.title: Integrate & Use
integrate.desc: Access purchased vectors via our MCP-compatible API. Track usage, performance, and ROI through comprehensive analytics dashboards.

finance.title: Financial Analysis
finance.desc: Access specialized models for market prediction, risk assessment, and algorithmic trading strategies trained on proprietary financial data.

code.title: Code Generation
code.desc: Leverage domain-specific code generation models fine-tuned for frameworks, languages, or architectural patterns.

medical.title: Medical Diagnosis
medical.desc: Integrate specialized medical AI capabilities for image analysis, symptom assessment, and treatment recommendations.

content.title: Content Creation
content.desc: Access creative AI models for copywriting, design generation, video editing, and multimedia content production.

finalCta.heading: Ready to Join the AI Capability Revolution?
finalCta.subheading: Whether you're creating AI capabilities or looking to integrate them, Awareness Network is your gateway to the future of AI collaboration.

footer.tagline: The first marketplace for AI latent space vectors, powered by Neural Bridge and MCP technology.
